content.en: Optimizing Robotic Systems: Researchers have used genetic algorithms and other optimization techniques to improve the performance of various types of parallel manipulators. These algorithms were applied to optimize the articular velocities, dexterous maneuverability, system stiffness, kinematics performance, geometric parameters, workspace-constrained design, kinetostatic design, design parameters, topology design, singularity study, dimensional optimization, performance evaluation, kinematics analysis, and structure optimization of different parallel manipulators. The use of these algorithms has allowed researchers to achieve better designs and maximize the performance of these robotic systems.
content.da: Optimering af robotiske systemer: Forskere har anvendt genetiske algoritmer og andre optimeringsteknikker til at forbedre ydeevnen for forskellige typer parallelmanipulatorer. Disse algoritmer blev anvendt til at optimere leddhastigheder, fingerfærdige manøvredygtighed, systemstivhed, kinematisk ydeevne, geometriske parametre, design begrænset af arbejdsrum, kinetostatisk design, designparametre, topologidesign, singularitetsundersøgelse, dimensionel optimering, præstationsvurdering, kinematisk analyse og struktur optimering af forskellige parallelmanipulatorer. Anvendelsen af disse algoritmer har gjort det muligt for forskere at opnå bedre design og maksimere ydeevnen af disse robotiske systemer.
